subject: Re: My EVP & ITC experimentation systems tour

full_text:
Mike,

your EVP experiment. What was it? Also since you were using the the 
hacks wouldn't it be more real time communication verses EVP? Maybe 
something along the lines of "Disembodied Voices Experiment."

Just my rambling thoughts while cooking Sunday dinner :)

Gabreael
